verses.name: Esther 3:13
verses.text: And the letters were sent by posts into all the king’s provinces, to destroy, to kill, and to cause to perish, all Jews, both young and old, little children and women, in one day, even upon the thirteenth day of the twelfth month, which is the month Adar, and to take the spoil of them for a prey.

verses.name: Esther 3:14
verses.text: The copy of the writing for a commandment to be given in every province was published unto all people, that they should be ready against that day.
